entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
